text: What is a benefit of using Amazon Aurora Serverless?

answers.text: Aurora Serverless automatically scales the DB cluster capacity up or down.
Aurora Serverless will automate disaster recovery between regions.
Aurora Serverless will automatically recreate the DB in a different AZ, if the current AZ becomes unavailable or fails.
It's cheaper to use Aurora Serverless than regular Aurora.
Aurora SLA applies to Aurora Serverless just as they do to regular Aurora.
